# Complex mixed requirements file

# Standard packages
requests==2.28.0
django>=3.2,<5.0

# Packages with extras
celery[redis]>=5.0

# With markers
typing-extensions>=4.0; python_version<"3.10"

# Direct URLs
git+https://github.com/user/repo.git#egg=mypackage

# With hashes
flask==2.0.1 --hash=sha256:abc123

# Editable installs
-e git+https://github.com/user/dev-repo.git#egg=devpackage

# With inline comments
numpy>=1.20  # Scientific computing
